name: Larbous Floating Menu
author: Luiz Sobral

sections.description:
This plugin creates a floating menu set to the left position.

You can set:
* Choose a custom menu
* the color of the menu options: font e background
* the vertical position of the screen

Set the options in Settings / Larbous Floating Menu
sections.installation:
Install Instructions

  1. Upload the folder larbous-floating-menu to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your site
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress
  3. Upload to media library your icons with size 48×48 or similar
  4. Create a customized Menu in Appearence / Menu
  5. Create options like \”Option Item \”
  6. Save with any name. This plugin assumes as default the name \”Larbous Floating Menu\”
sections.faq:
How insert a icon after menu item?

Use this example at the Menu item
Home page < img src=\”http://yoursite.com/wp-content/uploads/icone_chat.png\” / >
sections.changelog:
1.2

The Serbian, Italian and Spanish languages ​​were incorporated. Thanks to Borisa Djuraskovic by translating into Serbian language.

1.1

The area of the mouseover was restricted to the visible space, usually the icon.

1.0

  • The first version without modifications

upgrade_notice: This update fixes the area where the mouseover will work. Before this area was invading the space of the site, now it only restricted to visible part. Only the file =larbous-floating-menu= has changed.
